text: Rheology is the study of the flow of liquids and soft solids like mud or blood.Schowalter W.R. 1978. Mechanics of non-Newtonian fluids. Oxford: Pergamon. Rheo means flow in Greek. ==Related pages== *Fluid dynamics ==Other websites== *What's Rheology? *Rheology Society == References == Category:Fluid mechanics
title: Rheology
